plot: In a society fascinated by the power of money, the biped is furious to observe the ability of the mighty to oppress the weak. One day, he decides to rise against the system, alone, sinking into an uncontrollable spiral of violence.
title: Portrait of a Biped with Flexible Morals
plot_es: In a society fascinated by the power of money, the biped is furious to observe the ability of the mighty to oppress the weak. One day, he decides to rise against the system, alone, sinking into an uncontrollable spiral of violence.
original_name: Portrait of a Biped with Flexible Morals
